subtitle.Text: When you put out any sort of content about your game online, whether it’s screenshots or whether it’s gameplay or anything along those lines,
you kind of - you’re sort of at the mercy of the internet and you sort of want to see what people are going to respond to, whether it’s positive or negative - hopefully it’s positive.
But we put out a screenshot awhile back of the TV room, among other screenshots, and there’s lots of wonderful comments and I was really happy about that,
but one of the comments that I saw a couple of times was people talking about how greasy this pizza box was - something I hadn’t noticed,
so I went back and I checked it and it was a very greasy pizza box.
Maybe Sam’s into deep dish pizza, who knows, but I’m glad we didn’t change it, I’m glad we kept it just as gross as it always was. I like it!
